plot: A French glamor photographer pursues a young American model through Paris where they begin a love affair and explore his underworld connections in the sex/modeling industry.
title: Traci, I Love You
plot_es: A French glamor photographer pursues a young American model through Paris where they begin a love affair and explore his underworld connections in the sex/modeling industry.
plot_en: A French glamor photographer pursues a young American model through Paris where they begin a love affair and explore his underworld connections in the sex/modeling industry.
